episodes.title: Squad Up
episodes.synopsis: After a fairly quiet Thanksgiving break, Lamar returns to State College, but what he doesn't know is that Mia has a little adventure planned for him and the others when they return.

episodes.title: No Boundaries
episodes.synopsis: After a fairly quiet Thanksgiving break, Lamar returns to State College, but what he doesn't know is that Mia has a little adventure planned for him and the others when they return.

episodes.title: Rumble In The Praire
episodes.synopsis: The true tournament of Power begins. Lamar and the DDR gang head to Illionois for the Rumble in the Praire Tournamenet. How far will our heroes make it?

episodes.title: The Internship: Part I
episodes.synopsis: Lamar has obtained his first internship at Erie Insurance. He hopes this firsthand experience will teach him new skills and give new perspective on the IT Industry

episodes.title: The Sunken Place
episodes.synopsis: Wrapped in school, work, and club activities, Lamar finds himself feeling trapped. Something doesn't feel quite right and he can't put his finger on it..

episodes.title: The Break Up
episodes.synopsis: What was supposed to be an ordinary trip to Walmart goes horrible wrong when a special guest from the past returns

episodes.title: Where am I now?
episodes.synopsis: Lamar ponders on his life choices. Memories of the past show up at every corner prompting an internal battle between hope and sorrow. Where are we now?
